mapper.select: SELECT dcr.id, dcr.env_id, dcr.description, dcr.k8s_kind, dcrc.id contentId, dcr.name, dcrc.content resourceContent, dcr.created_by, dcr.last_update_date, dcr.creation_date FROM devops_customize_resource dcr LEFT JOIN devops_customize_resource_content dcrc ON dcr.content_id = dcrc.id where dcr.id = #{resourceId}
